annotations.description: The fans must be pleased with the show they have seen on the pitch today. There was no chance to get bored as the game was very attractive. annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Andros Townsend (Newcastle Utd) scores with a great individual effort! He makes a good run, skips past defenders and smashes the ball from the edge of the box past the diving goalkeeper. His low drive went into the bottom left corner. Absolutely phenomenal!
